title: Fulgrim: The Palatine Phoenix
creator: Graham McNeill
description: As the Great Crusade draws to a close, Primarch Fulgrim leads his Emperor's Children in pursuit of perfection. This prideful quest sets them on a dark path of corruption, chronicling the tragic fall of the III Legion and its primarch.
subject: warhammer-40k
